info.name: Tumblr--Wind Waker Post Icons
info.description: Replaces the post icons with Legend of Zelda: the Wind-waker themed ones.
info.additionalInfo: I thought very intently  about making a dumb link/Link joke, but am proud to tell you I am actually a mature adult with self restr...nah, that's bollocks. Enjoy.

data.title: Old icons over lapping the new ones.
